name: Leash POV
description:
I had trouble getting images like this without img2img support, so I decided to train a model for it. LORA comes in two flavors: Dom (holding leash) and Sub (on leash).

Support me on Ko-Fi!

meta.prompt: leashing_pov, masterpiece, ultra hd, absurdres, best quality, pinup
meta.negativePrompt: ((speech bubble, text, lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, bad face, text, error, missing fingers, grayscale, extra digit, fewer digits, cropped, worst quality, low quality, normal quality, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, blurry, artist name))
